main event: On 26 July 1948, an observer at the Atlanta Naval Air Base sighted a blue-white light traveling southeast, which was confirmed by multiple witnesses in the area.
interesting points: The light was described as similar to a shooting star but maintained a uniform altitude and speed,Several residents reported seeing the same light shortly after the initial sighting,The weather conditions were clear with excellent visibility at the time of the sighting,Reports from various witnesses indicated that the light was silent and appeared to gain altitude before disappearing,Articles in local newspapers referenced the sighting and confirmed that multiple individuals had observed the phenomenon.
witness description: Residents of Georgia Tech Apartments and military personnel at Atlanta Naval Air Base.
